page_content: Discusses the conditions under which spouses are eligible for a dual-earner tax deduction in Switzerland.
Discusses the conditions and regulations for the use of wind energy in the Canton of Bern, Switzerland.
Provides guidelines on how to maintain accounting records for tax purposes in Switzerland.
Explains various types of taxable income in Switzerland, such as royalties, rental income, and grants.
Discusses how to declare financial expenses for tax purposes in Switzerland, specifically for businesses in agriculture and forestry.
Provides information on how to declare income from bonds and treasury bills for tax purposes in Switzerland.
Reports the closure of a bar in Hinterkappelen due to various legal violations, including those related to food safety and environmental protection.
